subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jim Harbaugh, the pugnacious first-year coach of the San Francisco 49ers, takes any criticism of his team as fuel as he works to reinvigorate the franchise.
snippet: Jim Harbaugh, the pugnacious first-year coach of the San Francisco 49ers, takes any criticism of his team as fuel as he works to reinvigorate the franchise.
